title: Sansui 178 cm (70 inches) 4K Ultra HD Smart Android LED TV JSW70ASUHDFF (Ebony Black)
description: Low Latency- Enjoy a lag less gaming and entertainment experience with BEAST Mode for 50ms low latency so that your sessions always stay smooth Playback- It offers a total playtime of up to 40HRS, including up to 10HRS of playtime per earbud. Drivers- Delve into the boAt immersive auditory experience on Airdopes 190 TWS earbuds courtesy its powerful 10mm audio drivers. Clear Voice Calls- Be heard clear across voice calls without those usual interruptions, with the ENx Tech enabled quad mics that cancel out unwanted background noises during calls, on Airdopes 190. ASAP Charge- Our ASAP Charge feature that lets the earbuds garner up to 180 minutes of playtime in just 10 minutes of charging.
